docs.snippet: THE outstanding achievement of the recent Pan-American aviation conference at Lima, Peru, will undoubtedly prove to be the stimulation of Government interest in supplying aviators with efficient weather reports and the coordination of the various...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE outstanding achievement of the recent Pan-American aviation conference at Lima, Peru, will undoubtedly prove to be the stimulation of Government interest in supplying aviators with efficient weather reports and the coordination of the various weather services into a vast inter-American hook-up.

headline.main: LIMA MEET IN REVIEW; Conference Is United on Weather but Not On Politics Two Nations Oppose Code Another Disagreement

docs.snippet: HAD to get up early this morning to make the 8:18 in order to get me in town to see a color sample that the painter had ready for me. He wanted to get it settled so that he could lay in the color of the big set today.

docs.snippet: Gaining momentum as the day progressed, the decline yesterday in bond prices was the broadest in more than three years. Domestic corporation issues crumbled under the steady pressure of selling, the worst declines being shown among the secondary and...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gaining momentum as the day progressed, the decline yesterday in bond prices was the broadest in more than three years. Domestic corporation issues crumbled under the steady pressure of selling, the worst declines being shown among the secondary and convertible bonds.

headline.main: BONDS FALL MOST IN THREE YEARS; Secondary and Convertible Loans Hardest Hit as Selling Is Relentless

docs.snippet: Brazil has established as part of her new state-of-war regime one of the most efficient censorships ever devised in South America. It not only prevents the egress of any news except what the government wants to let out but also establishes close...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil has established as part of her new state-of-war regime one of the most efficient censorships ever devised in South America. It not only prevents the egress of any news except what the government wants to let out but also establishes close control over all business and private mail entering or leaving the country.
docs.abstract: Strict imposition by Brazil (J W White)

headline.main: TIGHT GENSORSHIP IMPOSED BY BRAZIL; Bars Egress of News That the Regime Dislikes-Controls All Mail In and Out
